website_summaries.verdict: A larger box that comes with a foam lining to protect your electronics or firearm.
pros: Size is a little larger for bigger items, but still compact
Can take an exterior lock for travel
Foam can be fitted to your equipment
Case is durable and well constructed
cons: Once cut, the "pluck n' pull" foam is limiting in that it can be used with only one pre-fitted set up

customer_reviews.title: Pelican 1170 fits 1911s
customer_reviews.text: This product has served me well. I have used it to travel via airlines around the states. After declaring the firearms and going through the TSA checks, I just put a lock on it and put it in my checked luggage. Used the pick n pluck foam to fit 1911s without rails up to 5.75" in barrel length. Essentially this case can fit a full size 1911 or smaller. I have attached pictures of my Ruger SR1911 Commander. The case is sturdy and has double throw latches. Overall, great quality for the price. BTC: 1HJb8vykapxgiSg8xpg2AMnHcUQ7eyaJVq
customer_reviews.author: COAL

customer_reviews.title: Tip: Suggested padlocks that fit this case
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Very secure storage and worth every penny. I spent quite a bit of time looking for locks for this case. This older style has the padlock holes mounted inboard making it hard to match up with a lock just by eye alone. Read a lot of reviews but no model numbers for suggestions. So here is some help. Amazon has a two pack of padlocks that fit perfectly and look great. Masterlock 380T with Rustoleum finish. About $15 for the two keyed alike locks. Bonus is the locks do not touch the surface of whatever the case is setting on. About 1/4" clearance. I believe they look sharp. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Fit a Glock 27 and spare mag well
customer_reviews.text: This of course is the best case out there a far as quality. The 1170 is a bit small if your looking to pack firearms. I was able to fit a Glock 27, a spare magazine and 50 round case but it is tight. Would've been better without the ammo case for sure. I bought it for air travel because I know I can count on the durability and it can be double locked
customer_reviews.author: Eric V

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling via air with pistol
customer_reviews.text: Its exactly what I wanted and needed. It fits my S&W M&P 40c perfectly with the magazine released, along with 20 rounds of ammunition in the box. (See pictures). I secure it with 2 Masterlock 140T padlocks for air travel and it is great! No unneeded added weight which is important when considering luggage weight restrictions.
customer_reviews.author: NAS0314

customer_reviews.title: It’s a pelican alright
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect! Exactly what I wanted and for anyone who is curious it holds pipe tobacco pouches perfectly! It’s my travel case for my pipe! I get 4 full pouches, 2 zippo lighters, 1 falcon pipe stem, 2 falcon pipe bowls, 2 baggies of pipe cleaners, and 2 humidifier stones! Love this thing as I tend to travel a lot and go hiking/camping and this thing is perfect for protecting my stuff but it’s a tad bit bulky to pack for a long hike. But it’s rigid and spacious and the pick and pluck foam is easy to use! Fantastic product
customer_reviews.author: K.G.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as Expected
customer_reviews.text: Regardless of the color, which I like, the equipment works great. It has multi squared foam in the inside which you can cut or separate to your gun size and still has space for at least another magazine. Is great for flying in your checked baggage with two lock holes for TSA approved locks. However, the foam-dirt strips easily so I wrap my weapon in two sandwich sized plastic wraps and the mag in one so the items won't get dirty. These pelican cases are highly protective and that's why they may be a little more expensive but they should use better quality foam.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Voldemort Messed Up
customer_reviews.text: I have had this pelican case for a while now - to include a deployment to Afghanistan. It is absolutely incredible. It's fallen out of a helicopter, vehicles, flown commercial as both carry-on and regular luggage and traveled across the country by various vehicles. I love this case and it has protected my gaming laptops for years without fail. That includes inclement and wet weather, cold weather... I am convinced that Voldemort messed up and should have hid one of his Horcrux' in a Pelican case in a swamp. His loss.
customer_reviews.author: Steakburger

customer_reviews.title: another awesone pelican product at a nice price
customer_reviews.text: you get what you pay for, and Pelican costs the most because it's the best - this small case was actually a really good price - standard "egg carton" lid insert and two flat container foam inserts, one thick, one thin, very durable, can padlock for security, nice small size, holds large frame 4 inch .357 revolver or .40 cal. pistol with extras, holds all kinds of travel gear, electronics, bush craft / camping essentials, very versatile - been using Pelican products of all sizes for over twenty years, this small case is excellent
customer_reviews.author: schlitz

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: These are the best cases on the market. I use them to protect my handguns. With the right foam inserts, they cradle the weapons like a baby. The 'pluck and pull' is little clunky especially if you have any OCD but I purchased a 3rd party insert for each handgun. These cases are indestructible. I'm on my 4th one!
customer_reviews.author: M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Optimal M&P9 Shield storage
customer_reviews.text: THE case for a S&W M&P9 Shield M2.0 and extra mags. Used for long-term storage and for those places where weapons are prohibited. Quality materials throughout. Pick N PluckTM foam isn't easy to work with, especially for us OCDs so Plasti Dip is practically mandatory. It evens-out the appearance because it fills gaps and stabilizes shape. Disliked having to buy it but at least it can be used on other items. American Lock A1105KA padlocks work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Klaatu

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan of pluck and pull foam
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice case. The pluck out foam makes it very easy. I would recommend using a light colored highlighter to trace around whatever you plan to carry. Once that's done just pull out foam blocks that are inside the outline and you've got a great looking and impact resistant case. One the small foam blocks are pulled out its hard to put them back in. They won't stick so you need to use some glue but they never look as good as the unplucked areas.
customer_reviews.author: JDRanger

customer_reviews.title: Great little pistol case
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to remove the foam cleanly (no tools required except if you want a clean chunk removed), Fits whatever you want, and keeps rattle down. Only downside is the lock ports are a bit on the small side, so even if you have a SFF-ICC padlock, it can't rotate freely (this can be good or bad). May work fine with a small Master lock or something, but the large form factor locks with the thick shackles will not fit. You can also see the squares cut into the foam easily, so it can be a bit of an aesthetic issue, but you'd just have to get a solid foam core and use a hot wire for that.
customer_reviews.author: hitemlow

customer_reviews.title: Pelican makes excellent cases and the internal foam is easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. Pelican makes a high quality product. This is the third one I have purchased. Of the first two, one is smaller and one is larger. Each is being used to transport a different piece of electronic equipment. This one arrived in perfect condition and has been put to use. I like the internal foam that you can "pluck" out to create custom slots in which to place items. Be sure to leave an appropriate amount of foam padding on all sides, and top and bottom of items placed in cases such as this.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: It’s Perfect for a Scuf Infinity1 Controller.
customer_reviews.text: As the title says, I have a gaming controller which costs just over $200 for the Xbox One. The pluck foam is convenient to fit this controller, of course, I made myself some modifications to fit the controller’s accessories and a Solid State Drive. I travel around the states for gaming competitions with friends as a hobby, not a self-proclaimed MLG just yet, just a gamer that loves all forms of First Person Shooters. Surely, some gamers have said that the case is overkill, but $200 is something I don’t want destroyed. I’m definitely ordering a case in the future for another controller, this one is going to be a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Jomar saiah

customer_reviews.title: Really nice pistol case for flying.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for myself for travel and another for my brother. He liked it so much, he ordered one for his girlfriend. Very nice little case. Fits my M&P 9 Shield with 3 mags perfectly. Nice solid construction and will need two medium size padlocks to lock up. Large padlocks have too thick of a shank.
customer_reviews.author: Aardvark56

customer_reviews.title: the case works great, i use it when i travel outside my ...
customer_reviews.text: the case works great, i use it when i travel outside my state. I use it with a Glock 17Gen4 which is the full size along with a Surefire Fury flashlight and with two CR123 batteries. the case is strong does what i need it to do
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Snugged but still perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Well i recived this a week early, which is a hug plus. It is smaller than what i expected. The pluck n pull was easy to do. Just make sure you messure it out. If your like me an do not want to use a marker. Be prepared to tripple check. It fits my S&W SD9VE with both mags. Well the mag is in the gun still, but still fits. What i did was take the foam i plucked out and added back in a single layer of it in to give it a lift, making it flush. My only grip was the locking mechanism is lose for the finger latch. Still a excellent case.
customer_reviews.author: Jomar

customer_reviews.title: Fits a S&W Shield with extra mag and rounds
customer_reviews.text: Used this to fly with a S&W shield. It was a tight fit, but I managed to carve out enough foam to fit the Shield, 2 mags, and a small 25round box of ammo.Everything had at least a bit of foam padding in-between. The case is rock solid. It's super strong, and the TSA had no issues with it at each location. I also recommend (like others have said) the Master Lock 140T Solid Brass Keyed Alike Padlock with 1-9/16-inch Wide Body and 7/8-inch Shackle, 2-Pack. They fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Wo kommst du

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice storage box.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent case for storing a single handgun. I use it to store a nine mil semi auto pistol and to carry it to the shooting range. it is a good size for a single pistol and one or two spare magazines. It is perfect for securing a gun from children or from anyone that you don't want tampering with it. I found a couple of Brinks combination locks at Walmart that fit nicely in the locking holes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Perry

customer_reviews.title: This case is very well constructed. So well in ...
customer_reviews.text: This case is very well constructed. So well in fact, that my expectations were exceeded which rarely happens. Bought this case so I could fly with my Smith & Wesson M&P .40c. I can fit the unloaded gun, clip and box of 20 shells. The gate agent and TSA had no problem with this case. I will say that if you're looking to buy a firearm case for travel, buy one size bigger than you think you need.
customer_reviews.author: DuderMaguder

customer_reviews.title: It fit!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that the Smith and Wesson Model 10 with a 4" barrel I bought for my wife's birthday wasn't going to fit in this case and I'm pleasantly surprised that it does, as well as room for 4 speed loaders! Yes, it's larger that the pluck-n-pick area, but that doesn't bother me because I'm going to plastidip it anyways and cut it to fit instead of pluck-n-pick so that it's aestheticly pleasing. I may turn the foam around on the top and plastidip the Smith and Wesson logo on there, we'll see. The case is of very high quality and I feel confident that it will keep her revolver nice!
customer_reviews.author: Katie H.

customer_reviews.title: You'll love these
customer_reviews.text: Great case! I bought two of them. My Glock 30 and two extra magazines and a box of ammo fit inside without issue if you lay everything out right. The other one fits an M&P Shield in 9 mm, two extra magazines, and a box of ammo. Perfect for airline travel in your checked bags only, and airline and TSA approved!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory T Lees

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: Its a pelican case! Just holding any case from this company you can tell why they are a little pricey. Built like a tank, I love the customizable foam on the inside for cutting out whatever you're planning on putting in there. I bought this case for taking my Glock 19 with me during travel around the US. This case is just big enough for the G19, 1 spare magazine and a small box of ammunition (per most airline travel guidelines) Now all I need is more pelican cases for other firearms.
customer_reviews.author: eryk22c

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case for my guns
customer_reviews.text: Great case. It says it is waterproof, Crack proof, dustproof etc. I have yet to test that. However I feel like my baby (sig sauer p239) is well protected inside this case. It can only fit 1 gun and i was able to put 2 mags. I can actually fit another 1 or 2 mags. The foams are already precut so u just need to dig in and remove what you don't need. It was a breeze to customize it to the shape of my gun. Even a little kid in kindergarten can easily do it. Other than that, I highly recommend this case to everyone. Will be buying more. Possibly the big pelican cases too.
customer_reviews.author: Jan3t

customer_reviews.title: Great Case. A little small for 92FS or similar.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this case, I plan to use it for air transportation of a firearm. Appears to be very high quality. Also purchased Masterlock model 140T keyed padlocks to lock the case, and they have a good fit. The pluck and pull foam is easy to use and provides satisfactory results. For those who own a Beretta 92FS, Taurus PT92 or similar firearm, it does fit in this case, but only barely. I would suggest buying a larger size up for full frame semi-autos.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Just Get It!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to keep my firearm safe, and this is it. I've used it for transport and I've used it with a lock to put my firearm away when my GF was babysitting. I've been in law enforcement/military for 10+ years and this is one of the more affordable and durable items that I've ever used. Pelican brand is on top of the list for anyone and their practical needs. You won't be disappointed, I guarantee it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton L.

customer_reviews.title: Very cool. I don't have a high standard by what ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cool. I don't have a high standard by what I am impressed by, but I cut little slots in the foam to fit all the stuff i want to fit in there fit perfectly. I'm sure everyone does this but it just feels so 007. I don't store a gun or anything but when i go for the stuff that goes in here i feel like 007. I also bought a nice numbered padlock that just looks like it was made for this case. Very cool, good quality, would buy again. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi

customer_reviews.title: Stong little box.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this box with outfitted locks for my gun when traveling either thru the airports or on the road thru non gun friendly States. It is as advertised. I form fitted the foam inside for my Glock 26 with 2 extra magazines and a smaller box of self protecting bullets. works well.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Best little case
customer_reviews.text: Holds 6 tattoo machines. The case is not humongous. Fits nicely in a backpack along with other essential items when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Great as expected
customer_reviews.text: It's a pelican case so obviously the feel and overall quality is top notch. Good for compact handguns. Use it for a CZ P07. Would imagine you can fit a P09 or barely fit a Beretta 92FS. Couldn't picture really any Glock not fitting in it. Most full sized handguns would probably fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Pelican quality
customer_reviews.text: Pelican quality. I bought this for air travel with a medium sized pistol. Was able to cut out shapes for pistol, box of hollow points, and 2 mags in a very organized orientation. Fantastic in combination with these locks:  always have 2 EXTRA locks with you when flying. If TSA cuts your locks for any reason, you won't be able to bring it home unless you can lock it again right there.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: They are strong and secure and look great. My only complaint is the label.
customer_reviews.text: I have six of these cases for various handguns. They are big enough for a full-size CZ 75 along with two magazines. They are strong and secure and look great. My only complaint is that it would be nice if the label were removable. Not a big thing and certainly not worth a star. One really great feature is that you can buy the foam separately for a good price so, if you change the contents, you can re-customize the case. I have one revolver that is too large for the pluck and pick foam so I bought a new set of foam and used the "dimpled" foam on both the top and bottom for a nice secure fit.
customer_reviews.author: Craig B. Foltz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Case for Traveling with a Handgun
customer_reviews.text: Excellent case for traveling with a handgun. Very sturdy, very tough, and will last forever. My ONLY complaint is the “pick and pluck” foam. That stuff is junk and falls apart too easily. However if you coat it in a few layers of Plastidip after you pluck out your outline it will be much less prone to falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Durable and quality construction
customer_reviews.text: I really like the construction and durability of this case. It turned out to be too small for the pistol and 2 magazines that I wanted to put in it. It comfortably holds one pistol and one magazine, I had difficulty getting a second magazine in it without it touching or rubbing on the first magazine. The case is small enough to hide but easy to access when necessary. Love this for protecting my pistol.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Pelican cases are the best!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pelican case was my first case to save my fidget spinners some of this spinner are really expensive so I really needed something that I can trust to protect them and this was the best choice since I bought this one I like it so much that I bought model 1520 and im2100 👍 The smallest in my attached picture is a 1170 medium is im2100 and the big one is a 1520👍
customer_reviews.author: Victor Sepulveda.

customer_reviews.title: I won’t survive nuclear fallout, but my camera will!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my Sony a6500, 55-210mm, and a couple of batteries. I expect to be able to fit another (smaller) lens in there, too. For those hoping to do the same, know that I had to shallow the foam to make this fit, which was surprising because I’ve seen others do it and mention nothing about alterations (not Pelican’s problem).
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and strong!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say it’s a pelican! They set the standard for everyone that’s trying to make similar cases. If you want the best it is! I am a commercial photographer and I have to be able to trust that my gear will arrive protected. Can’t say when I first started using Pelican because it was too long ago, I don’t recall ever having a case break!
customer_reviews.author: curtis m.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Too small really. Lots of money on something so small. If I had seen one in person, I wouln't have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: dawhoo

customer_reviews.title: Built to last... Forever
customer_reviews.text: When it came in I could tell right away that this is thing was built like a tank and could withstand lots of abuse, some quality material I I do say so myself. Unfortunately it wasn't the right size for my intended use so I had to return it for a refund, which is kind of a bummer since return shipping coated a third of the price but that's my fault for not being precise on the measuments... Only thing I would like to see if an assortment of colors cause black gets kind of old, but that's just me.
customer_reviews.author: BakedTofu

customer_reviews.title: By far the best case I own
customer_reviews.text: Awesome case! Easily fit my Kahr CW9 and 3 spare magazines, plus locks and a few training rounds. I used a sharp razor with a sawing motion to cut the foam on an angle and it worked great. Since my CW9 is a single stack, I added a thin layer of foam below the gun after I made the cuts to bring it flush to the top of the foam. Probably wouldn't need to do that with a double stack like Glock 19, etc. This is by far the best case I own and I plan to purchase additional cases for my other guns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS CASE WONDERFULLY MEETS ALL MY EXPECTATIONS
customer_reviews.text: The Pelican 1170 Case with Foam is a very durable, well-made, high quality product. I love it. The internal form can be customized to fit whatever object you are transporting. Just remember to plan carefully BEFORE you begin pulling out the small semi-attached foam cubes. That planning will ensure that you obtain your desired custom fit. The case has two latches that are each lockable with padlocks (that you would separately provide). That, plus the fact that it is hard sided also means that it satisfies TSA requirements if you are using the case to fly legally with a firearm in your checked baggage.
customer_reviews.author: James T. Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Pelican makes some of the nicest cases you can buy and this case is no exception. I've since switched to soft cases because they're more compact and lighter, but, for a hardcase, this is some of the best money will buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best ever buy it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutley satisfied and couldnt be happier. The delivery was a tad late but it was worth every second waiting. I apologize for the bad review when it was running late. But that should show how much i love these boxes.!
customer_reviews.author: Goyim Gentile-Smith

customer_reviews.title: G19 carry box
customer_reviews.text: The box is very sturdy. It’s TSA APPROVED. Great for traveling with. I used it to check my gun in when I flew. It has a pluck foam. I’m not to much of a fan of that but it works. It’s just a little flimsy but you can put some kind of coating and it will be good. So if you are carrying a GLOCK 19 it will fit just fine and you can even put space for a mag and a box of ammo(Hornady critical defense).
customer_reviews.author: Issac

customer_reviews.title: Too small for full size hand gun, Glock 17, XD, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love this product. It may have been my mistake for not double checking measurements, but it definitely does not fit a full size pistol comfortably. Color is awesome. Build quality is phenomenal. Overall, would buy again if I found myself with an urge for a smaller frame firearm.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good as a watch box
customer_reviews.text: Don’t think Pelican boxes need my review, but I bought an 1170. Should’ve organized the watches a bit better but the depth and height is perfect for a watch collection. Not my first pelican so I know this box is capable of levels of protection that surpasses my needs for these watches lol
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Not surprisingly, this case does exactly what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Nice fit & finish. Typical Pelican quality. Easily fits a Glock 17 (or other "full-size" Glock) with a spare magazine without issue. I can fit all three magazines in there, but it doesn't fit into my pretty gun-and-magazine-shaped holes in the pick & pluck foam. I got this for carrying the gun on an airplane (locked up, in the suitcase under the plane) and I am satisfied with it. It could fit a Glock 34 or other tactical/long slide version, but you'd have to get a tiny bit more creative to fit all three magazines than I was.
customer_reviews.author: Rosco

customer_reviews.title: Great tough box hey where are you guys for checking a firearm for air travel.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the security and sturdiness that would expect from a name like Pelican. This partGreat tough box hey where are you guysicular size fits a full-size pistol and extra magazine without issue. It exceeded all of the requirements for checking a firearm for air travel. My only hangup is that the placement for the padlock hole is a bit tight and requires a much longer shanked padlock.
customer_reviews.author: kayakingbackflip

customer_reviews.title: Meets TSA Guidelines for Firearms
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice case. Not specifically designed for a firearm, but it works perfectly for my Browning 1922 32 cal. handgun and two magazines. Room for a box of ammo, too. A recent trip to Texas from DC went without a hitch as the case and recommended Master 140T locks passed TSA inspections easily. The pull apart foam inside was easy to shape for my gun, with razorknife trimming where needed around irregular shapes.
customer_reviews.author: CC52

customer_reviews.title: The case is sturdy as you would expect from a Pelican
customer_reviews.text: The case is sturdy as you would expect from a Pelican. I would have rated 5 stars except this item came up when I searched for a pistol case. It's too small for a standard size side arm. The pistol can fit inside the case, but not with the foam insert. The foam has a 3/8 rim all the way around the case and the pistol has to be crammed in which crushes the foam and defeats the purpose. If you have a small 380 it could work, but it's no good if you have a beretta 92fs.
customer_reviews.author: BeLar

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this case
customer_reviews.text: I Absolutely LOVE this case! I Needed something durable for my flight. Something that I could lock. This case is tsa approved, and is able to hold two locks. This case fit my gun, two clips, and a box of ammo. Once I landed, I immediately checked my firearm and it looked exactly them same. My personal items were all over the luggage, my firearm and acc were perfectly intact. Customer for life here.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but the best out there...
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion this is still a bit pricey for such a small case, but it's one of the best you can find and you won't find a good one much cheaper. It barely fits my full sized XDm or Ruger 9E, so it would be nice if it was a touch larger but the next size up is way too big for my application so I settled on this. No regrets so far.
customer_reviews.author: Just me...

customer_reviews.title: Very Small case
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to house an ADJ pinpoint gobo light I had purchased also here on Amazon. I reviewed the dimensions of the light and compared it to the dimensions interior of this case to make sure it would fit. It does fit but this is a very small compact case, about the size of a child's sandwich box. It includes pluck foam so you can customize the interior to your hearts desire. Just wish I had gotten a larger cage, my concern is I may leave this at an event because it is so unnoticeable. Perhaps if I attach a large brick to it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wristen

customer_reviews.title: Great case but...
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller than expected. I reckon you'll be able to only get one sub-compact or 380 handgun with about two or three mags tops. I also thought I was going to be able to use it for camera gear but it's kind of small for that. Great product otherwise! I'll be looking for a bigger one for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Chris C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for carrying my Sig Sauer and a few other things.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a transport case when I fly. It fits my P938 w/TLR-6, a pocket holster, three magazines (one inside the pocket holster) along with one of my edc knives and back up batteries for the TLR-6. It could probably fit a few more things but I didn't want to weaken the walls surrounding my gear. I lock the box with 2 Master locks and it's perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Nice case for P290RS
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case for travel. It's exceptionally made and heavy duty. It has plenty of room for my P290RS, three mags, and my pocket holster. I could have easily got another magazine in there if I wanted to. The pick and pluck foam is easy to pluck out allowing for a tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Meuser

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product...  though the 'pluck' foam may not be for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy product. The clasps are very secure. The plastic is strong. No concerns about it protecting what is in-side. A couple of minor points: - For myself, I prefer the 'egg carton' type foam over the 'pluck' foam as it allows to keep the box more generic. I swapped out the 'pluck' foam and use the case with no problems. If you plan on using the case for only one item, this is not an issue. - The pad lock holes are in a tight location and make certain size locks difficult to use. I suggest buying the case before buying pad-locks to make sure the locks you get will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Forcone

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Keep my small stockpile of silver coins in it. Does a great job and love how the foam keeps it protected. Very good construction. I will say that the latches on this can be a little hard for someone who doesn't have strong finger strength.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great product, value for money
customer_reviews.text: Do not forget to measure carefully what you are going to put it. The foams that you will be taking out cannot be put back the way it was. You can glue it back, the foams, but it will somewhat deformed. If you have to buy a lock, get the one that is recommended in size or diameter.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo D.

customer_reviews.title: You Can Fit Two!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about purchasing this due to its size that I wouldn't be able to transport two firearms inside of this case, but they fit! Pictured is a Glock 27 and a Ruger LCP. Both are small guns, so two full size wouldn't fit. For the first one I used the pull apart material to make the hole, for the Ruger I used an x-acto knife. If you're transporting a firearm in this case I strongly suggest cutting it out rather than using the pull apart foam.
customer_reviews.author: Schultz01

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pelican cases are the best form of protection of your valuables on the market. Unsurpassed quality. I purchased this particular pelican case to use for my Go Pro and some accessories so I can have it organized while I travel. But I have a few more just like it to use for my Pistol, and two of my camera's. Great build. Great protection, leak proof, Sand proof. Great to take to those sandy places Ie Afghanistan.
customer_reviews.author: LunaLikeTheMoon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent handgun case
customer_reviews.text: I waited to review this as my first one showed up missing 1 of the hinge pins. Exchange was simple enough and the replacement was just as expected from Pelican. Excellent case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It keeps my important things locked up and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my medical MJ stash. The cut outs are great to cut out various sizes of medication supplied by your dispensary. I also use it for concentrates etc. The way I have it set up right now it holds 3 8ths in separate jars, 4 grams on concentrate in jars and a row I use for spare batteries for my portable vape and spoons I use for my wax vape. I also have plenty of room to keep another spare vape just in case complete with charger.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, not a fan of pick and pluck though
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy case, good for travel or for the range. Has pick and pluck foam which most people like, but I myself am not a fan of. I'd expect high density solid foam inserts for the price they sell these. Plasti-dipping the pick and pluck foam will help prevent it from ripping apart and deteriorating like it did for me
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: The pluck and pick foam made it easy to keep the handgun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to travel with a handgun. The pluck and pick foam made it easy to keep the handgun, magazines, and ammo seperate and looking professional. The holes in the front make it easy to secure with a lock. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a hardsided case to fly with.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Green

customer_reviews.title: Why buy anything less?
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how they sell this so cheap. Hard cases are a bundle, but this bad boy is affordable and laughs in the face of other storage/travel solutions. Waterproof, pressure equalizing, floats. What you got? Nice camera bag buddy. Hope you don't drop it. Expensive watches? Sure, store them in a "watch roll." I prefer to protect my jewelry with more than a cow hide. Wait, you keep your gun in what? If you value anything enough to protect it (and it's less than 10x7x4 inches), get one of these. Heck, get 10. I probably will.
customer_reviews.author: Colin O

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: As everyone knows, Pelican makes the best cases, by far. I have one for each of my pistols. Love everything about them... except in my personal opinion, I do NOT like the pick and pluck foam. It's easy, but it's not as custom as I like. I buy Kiazan foam inserts that allow you to cut out the shapes perfectly for a tighter fit and MUCH better look. Just my preference.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Nasty

customer_reviews.title: This is such a awesome case - I've been watching youtube videos on pelican ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a awesome case - I've been watching youtube videos on pelican cases and I've always been interested - I desired to get a smaller one before getting a 1560 which I just ordered today - the 1170 is a perfect smaller case for knives and any small stuff you want to protect - it's hard and built extremely well - I will never get any other case other than pelican now that I've gotten my hand on one. If you don't have one and are interested - do what you gotta do to save your money and get one.
customer_reviews.author: David McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Will fit a Glock 22, two mags outside the Glock and a streamlight TLR-6 with at least one cube of foam between each piece and the side of the case. Note to ship this inside checked luggage TSA will require both locking points to be locked so you will need two locks or a long cable.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: I don't particularly like the Pluck foam
customer_reviews.text: Fit my Taurus Gr Millennium (PT111) and 2 mags with plenty of room to spare. I don't particularly like the Pluck foam, but that a preference thing and not representative of a defect with the item. Otherwise, it's an excellent case, zero flex, perfect for transporting my pistol inside a checked bag through TSA airline checks.
customer_reviews.author: Finn Man

customer_reviews.title: Got it for my Beretta PX4 Compact
customer_reviews.text: Fits my gun perfect! I can fit my Beretta PX4 Compact, speed loader, and two mags in this little thing. Its shock proof, water proof, and dust proof. Just be careful when pulling out the foam blocks. I pulled out one too many in a couple spots and my gun doesnt sit as still it could. I tried gluing them back in but the glue make it look really janky lol. Great case overall! My gun sat too deep in the case so I took the foam I plucked out and laid it down nice and tight in the area where it was pulled out. Now the gun sits perfectly flush when placed in its shape.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra419

customer_reviews.title: These set the standard
customer_reviews.text: These cases are nearly indestructible and absolutely water tight. All three of my "kids" are active duty USAF and swear by these things. I have them for my SD cards but they have them for computers, luggage, you name it.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Quality you expect from Pelican
customer_reviews.text: This case is as you would expect, as Pelican tends to be *the* name in protective cases for your equipment. It seals very firmly and purposefully when you close the latches, and the lock holes are good if you have something that needs to also be secured.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J.

customer_reviews.title: A great little box for delicate or sensitive equipment
customer_reviews.text: A great little box for delicate or sensitive equipment. Keep in mind that the inner pluck foam is a little more limiting than the size they specify for the inside of the case(s), so I recommend going a bit larger to be safe - and depending how much padding you want around your equipment. I purchased this for my Feiyu FY-G4 3-Axis Handheld Gimbal and it take the entire length of the inner foam. Still okay for me, but it reached the max space for the length. The box is typical Pelican - hard, solid, tough, and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Hon. Scott H. McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Love this case
customer_reviews.text: Love this case!! I will say that the interior dimensions are slightly deceiving, but wouldn't take away a star. There is technically foam around the interior edges not meant to be cut out. The cut out foam section is 9.5" x 5" x 1.5" My Beretta is almost 5.5" and I had to cut the exterior foam a bit. I know the foam will compress for larger items but if you don't want the extra tight fit maybe these dimensions will be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: MT OOLIE

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction, great quality product! I got this so I can keep my cargo safe while flying. I have no doubt it will do the job! The hinges are very strong, and it comes with interior tearable foam so you can fit it to any shape you want. I secured mine with 2x Master Lock 140Ts, which fit very well but require some light maneuvering to get in place.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: TSA - no problem.
customer_reviews.text: I pulled the sections of foam out to fit my full sized semi-automatic plus 3 magazines - fit perfectly. Went through TSA 4 times with no problems. Be sure and get slim shank locks - that have a longer shank. For local - I keep a magazine loaded plus the 3 on the side! I also used a "bike cable" with lock to "lock" the case inside my luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Shelia Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works well for 6 large GShocks
customer_reviews.text: Needed a second case to store some digital watches and this 1170 worked out ok. Wish it was tad deeper like the 1120 case but it will do.. The double throw latches make it very easy to lock and open.
customer_reviews.author: GMO

customer_reviews.title: Great for single handgun and clips/ammo
customer_reviews.text: Fits my M&P Shield 9mm with 2 clips and small sleeve of ammo. Foam is easy to remove just make sure to layout everything first before you start removing.
customer_reviews.author: Theo S.

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect. I like the foam insert
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these and have used them through TSA already. ... Just perfect. I like the foam insert ... rather than cutting out the bed for the device, you remove "pillars" of foam ... innovative indeed.
customer_reviews.author: R. D.

customer_reviews.title: World class
customer_reviews.text: Pelican cases are just the best. I am going to get the next size up for more of my field gear. You can buy replacement foam packs if you need to reconfigure the case, though the delivery on those may take awhile longer. I use the ABUS locks ( with this and am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: In Jupiter

customer_reviews.title: Well made, top quality.
customer_reviews.text: Needed it for 2 handguns. At first looked too small but fit 2 G19s no problem. No more room for extra mags. Perfect for one handgun extra mags or like my example. Box is study works well with padlocks.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 9mm with 3 magazines perfectly. Have flown ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 9mm with 3 magazines perfectly. Have flown with it many times. The master lock 1-9/16" 140T fits perfectly. I bought 2; one for each hole.
customer_reviews.author: brans

customer_reviews.title: Solid case for your smaller items.
customer_reviews.text: Love the case. Solid construction, just the right size to transport a small concealed carry pistol when flying with room for several magazines, a knife etc to spare. It may handle a larger full-size firearm but it'll start to get tight front-to-back. Note that these models do not have the stainless reinforced lock holes which is a disappointment. Those only come in the slightly larger and more expensive cases. The pluckable foam is simple to setup for your items. After plucking you may want to save them to glue down below your items to help raise them up (Actually mentioned in the directions).
customer_reviews.author: Chris A. Epler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, everything you expect from Pelican
customer_reviews.text: Tough, excellent quality, and a very good price. Everything I expect from Pelican. Holds my small pistol and a spare 8 round magazine with no problem. Mine had pluckable foam, which I didn't expect! I still cut out the outline of the pistol for a better fit. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: alicat32

customer_reviews.title: Love this case!
customer_reviews.text: This case is just perfect for my 38 special and I also purchased one for my 9MM. The 38 special fits perfectly along with 25 rounds of ammo. The case is a little bit too big for my 9MM but I was able to fit the 9MM along with 4 magazines. It also has a hole to put a lock which is very convient. LOVE that it has an air-tight seal so I also purchased those silica packs so I do not have to worry about the humidity ruining the gun or ammo kept in the case. Would definitely recommend buying,
customer_reviews.author: ABRobb

customer_reviews.title: A very strong case for protecting your stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Bose Sound Link II. This case provides a perfect 1/2 inch of padding all the way around the unit. The case is built like a tank, the latches and the thickness of the case are way overbuilt. (For protecting my toys I find this to be very reassuring.) Also the case has a very high cool factor. I have to store the charging cable outside the case due to the lack of extra space. Note the Sound Link III might have different dimensions so check it out before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: George Raft

customer_reviews.title: Best Case On Earth for under $999
customer_reviews.text: Very professional feel and look. I needed something custom to fit and protect high end electronics so I will be using these Pelican cases since the case clearly could protect against a nuclear disaster, and the fact that the foam is replacable is a big plus if you mess something up or want to protect a different posession
customer_reviews.author: Austin Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Will not fit a 2011
customer_reviews.text: Great case, normal pelican workmanship, however it is just too small to fit a full size 1911/2011 by a half inch.
customer_reviews.author: Example: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expect from a Pelican Case
customer_reviews.text: First off, let me start by saying that you will NEVER go wrong with buying a Pelican case for anything that you want to protect. I own seven different models, and have not been disappointed with a single one! This one is perfect for a handgun, hard drive, or sensitive electronics. I purchased this particular one to put a very expensive handgun in. I do wish it were slightly larger, as there is just enough room for the gun and one magazine while still leaving enough foam between them. A revolver could fit with room for at least three speedloaders though, or a smaller compact or subcompact pistol and two magazines.
customer_reviews.author: Southernmunitions

customer_reviews.title: Bottom line: great case ,perfect for compact but a tight fit for full size.
customer_reviews.text: The case is very well built. I love the design. But it is a very tight fit for a full size pistol. I wish it was an inch wider and longer and then it would be perfect. Bottom line: great case, perfect for compact but tight fit for full size.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Got it for flying
customer_reviews.text: updated review: After having used this case here is what i think. It's a great little case. Very durable and the pluck foam is nice and firm. Holds everything in place. Just ensure the gun cannot come out once locked. Update: I had no issues at all flying with this. Never had to even remove it from my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BooYah !!
customer_reviews.text: Top of the shelf quality. Pelican never lets you down and this one is no different. Prefect size for full size pistol and two Magazines !! This is what one expects out of a strong / protective box. Once sealed.. Waterproof !! Gotta take there word on it.. Not gonna submerge in water for hours to find out . But has a very good seal gasket .
customer_reviews.author: Hylnder64

customer_reviews.title: Got through Baggage claim no problem
customer_reviews.text: When my son died last year in Florida I was called to testify against his seller. My husband who is a Police officer needed a certified case to bring his gun with us. This case fit it and cleared the baggage claim with ease. AND I am being called again so seems it will get used again. RIP JTS
customer_reviews.author: Allison Locascio

customer_reviews.title: Feels very durable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for a Glock 43, extra mag, and an ammo wallet. Closes tight with holes to put locks through. Perfect for flying with a firearm. Feels very durable. I shook it and dropped it on the floor from waist height without disturbing anything inside
customer_reviews.author: vrbaffoni

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gun case to check a handgun at the airport
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gun case to check a handgun at the airport. We used this to secure our Ruger LCP along with Masterlock T140 locks. It was easy to modify the foam to fit the gun, gun lock and ammo. It was our first time checking a gun but this case made all the difference. We highly recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: puzzled91

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT ((( UPDATED))
customer_reviews.text: ********UPDATED************** I love the case, well made, durable, shipper and shipping was all great, but I got it for a Full Framed government size 1911 pistol, it works, but when I say barely, I mean barely, I put the gun, and two mags, it is slap full, if u think you want to put more stuff, then get the larger version, but the 1170 fits 1 gun & 2 mags, max. hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R Yelverton

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for subcompact Glock 43
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for subcompact Glock 43, two clips and some ammo!! I was also able to fit a full size combination lock with a slight modification using my drill.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel K. Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Use this for a handgun and it fits well and durable product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case to use it for a handgun. Use it for my Sig 2022. It's fits the gun and two magazines well. I had to slightly cut the foam to fit the sights better. Durable outside case and it has the hole to put locks on the case. Not heavy. The handle feels strong and folds in well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar- CA

customer_reviews.title: There really is no other name known for quality cases like pelican. Two years and zero issues with this ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this for pistol storage and it suits my needs perfectly. There really is no other name known for quality cases like pelican. Two years and zero issues with this case. Rugged and reliable. This fits a full sized pistol and two mags comfortably, but if you're hoping to fit much more I would look for a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

product_meta.title: Pelican 1170 Case With Foam (Desert Tan)
product_meta.description: Color:Desert TanUnbreakable, watertight, airtight, dust-proof, chemical resistant and corrosion proof. These are some of the features of this Pelican Protector Case that offers total protection for your equipment. It is made of Ultra High Impact structural polycarbonate that makes it extremely strong and durable. Its exclusive 1/4" (6.4 mm) neoprene O-ring and ABS latches seal perfectly and includes an automatic purge valve for quick equalization after changes in atmospheric pressure. Your equipment can fit into the high density foam of the case for total subjection and protection against impact, vibration or shock. Custom fit your stowage of equipment for maximum protection with the Pick-"N"-Pluck foam with convoluted lid foam. This case has IP-67 rated for waterproof protection. Case has interior dimensions of (L x W x H) 10.54" x 6.04" x 3.16" (26.77 cm x 15.34 cm x 8 cm), with a volume of 201.17 cubic inches (3.3 liters). The external dimensions are (L x W x H) 11.64" x 8.34" x 3.78" (29.57 cm x 21.2 cm x 9.6 cm). The case weighs 2.10 lbs with foam and 1.96 lbs empty. Case is made in the USA.
feature_bullets: WATERPROOF CASE: Waterproof protection (IP67) that delivers crushproof and dustproof protection for your camera, GoPro, gun, or other portable electronics and equipment
FEATURES: O-ring watertight seal, Pick N Pluck foam, double throw latches, automatic pressure equalization valve (balances interior pressure, keeps water out)
DIMENSIONS (LWH): INTERIOR - 10.54" x 6.04" x 3.16" ; EXTERIOR - 11.64" x 8.34" x 3.78"
TRUSTED MILITARY BRAND: Meets US and worldwide military standards for water resistance and crushproof, dustproof protection. Operational temperatures -40° F (-4 ° C) to 210° F (99 ° C).
WARRANTY: Lifetime. Made in the USA. You break it, we replace it … forever!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars1,441 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
